test.name: Login_Functional_TestCase01

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.doc: Sets the directory for captured screenshots.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Delete All Cookies
kw.doc: Deletes all cookies.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.doc: Sets the directory for captured screenshots.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Delete All Cookies
kw.doc: Deletes all cookies.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Exit For Loop
kw.doc: Stops executing the enclosing for loop.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Mouse Over
kw.doc: Simulates hovering the mouse over the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Pressing special key ENTER to element.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

arguments.arg: We cannot find an account with that email address

kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//*[@id="auth-error-message-box"]/div/div' contains exact text 'We cannot find an account with that email address'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Incorrect Username. Password screen does not come until username is not correct hence only 1 argument
